summary: This document is a series of email exchanges on July 8, 2019, regarding the pretrial processing of Jeffrey Epstein following his arrest. It includes coordination between law enforcement and pretrial services, mentions a sealed indictment, and references a search warrant executed at Epstein's residence where images were discovered.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the emails; his arrest, indictment, and pretrial processing are being coordinated. His date of birth is provided.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Offers to provide travel/passport information for Epstein and information about images found during a search of his residence.

persons.name: Pretrial Services Technician
persons.context: Requests Epstein's pedigree information, charging instrument, and estimated arrival time for pretrial services processing.

persons.name: D. C.
persons.context: Provides the sealed indictment, Epstein's date of birth, and states the Government will be seeking detention.

connections.description: The Special Agent is providing investigative information (travel/passport data and evidence from a search) about the defendant, Epstein.
D. C. is prosecuting Epstein, has filed a sealed indictment against him, and is seeking his detention.
The technician is coordinating the logistical intake and processing of Epstein following his arrest.

events.title: Coordination for Epstein's Pretrial Processing
events.description: Email exchanges coordinate the provision of Epstein's information, indictment, and arrival at pretrial services following his arrest.

events.title: Search of Epstein's Residence
events.description: A search warrant was executed at Jeffrey Epstein's residence, resulting in the discovery of images.

events.title: Unsealing of Indictment
events.description: A sealed indictment against Jeffrey Epstein is attached to an email, with plans to unseal it within the hour.

locations: Defendant's residence (location unspecified, searched pursuant to warrant)
keyFacts: A search warrant was executed at Jeffrey Epstein's residence, leading to the discovery of images.
A sealed indictment against Epstein (19 Cr. 490) was being prepared for unsealing on July 8, 2019.
The U.S. Government was seeking pretrial detention for Epstein.
Emails show coordination between the FBI, prosecutors, and pretrial services following Epstein's arrest.
